title: Bonnie Mary
text:
Bonnie Mary is a 1918 British <a href="silent%20film">silent</a> <a href="romance%20film">romance film</a> directed by <a href="A.%20V.%20Bramble">A. V. Bramble</a> and starring Miriam Ferris, Lionel Belcher, and <a href="Arthur%20M.%20Cullin">Arthur M. Cullin</a>.
Premise.
Two feuding Scottish families are united when their children fall in love.
